ignoreTransientNotifications.tooltip: Check this to ignore transient notifications.

showEmptyTray.tooltip: Check this to always show the notification tray.

showDisturbIcon.tooltip: Check this to show the 'Do Not Disturb icon' on the panel even when the 'Show notification tray' option is disabled.

showNotificationSettings.description: Show notification settings in the menu

blockList.description: Hide notifications from the list for the following apps:
blockList.tooltip: Comma-separated list of case-insensitive app titles

urgentList.description: Always consider URGENT the notifications from these apps:
urgentList.tooltip: Comma-separated list of case-insensitive app titles

keyOpen.tooltip: Set keybinding(s) to show the notification popup menu.

keyClear.tooltip: Set keybinding(s) to clear all notifications.

keyMute.tooltip: Set keybinding(s) to enable or disable notifications.
